file_content.text: It's a shame about the major, but he should have known better than to oppose a Sith.
Thanks for helping the major's son. It really meant a lot to him.
Welcome back, my lord. The major's in the adjoining lab with Doctor Tyrek, but he's not too happy.
Welcome back, my lord. We heard what you did for Major Bessiker's son. The major's in the lab with Doctor Tyrek.
I hope you find what you're after, my lord.
